description:
Looking for a sustainable style built with all the performance features you could ever want and need? What about one that also stays comfortable and secure as you move? Good news: prAna has got the answer you’ve been searching for. And they call it their men’s Mojo Short.

It's made with 100% recycled polyester, so it feels good in more ways than one. But this microfiber fabric isn’t just lightweight and comfortable, it’s also strong, with UPF 50+ and quick-dry properties. They also added a full inseam gusset for extra mobility.

All this is already great, but of course they added even more. It’s why you’ll find mesh-lined pockets on the front, a back pocket with Velcro pull-tag closure for safety, and a plush waistband that gives you security without the scratchiness sometimes caused by elastic.
name: Prana Mojo Shorts, 10" Inseam - Mens
